name: Smart Guide Cane 'Michishirube' ~ AI-Powered White Cane for Assisting the Visually Impaired ~
description: Michishirube is a white cane equipped with AI based on a proprietary machine learning model. It assists visually impaired individuals by detecting and notifying them of dangers such as train tracks, crosswalks, and vehicles during their walks, thereby enabling safer navigation.
